page.title: 14BRIDGE OF WEIR - INDUSTRY
page.content: The{Queens Award}to{Industry}was awarded to{Bridge of Weir Leather {Company}for outstanding export achievements .Their leather is exported to{26 different countries}and is of the very{high quality}neccesary for aeroplane and car ,upholstery and furniture. The{rawhides}are{obtained}when cattle from{Argentina and other exporting {countries,}are slaughtered for beef. The{skins}are packed in{salt}to be transported,and arrive at the factory still{covered}in{salt}and{hair}which must be{removed}before the{tanning {process}can begin.This consists of dyeing ,stretching and softening the hides.Much of the{work}is done by{hand}so the{workers}must{wear {protective clothing.}Altogether there are{23 seperate processes}before the leather can be used.
